org.apereo.cas.services

Interface ResourceBasedServiceRegistryDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ServiceRegistryDao

    public interface ResourceBasedServiceRegistryDao
extends ServiceRegistryDao
    This is ResourceBasedServiceRegistryDao, which describes operations relevant to a service registry that is backed by file-system resources.
    Since:
    5.0.0
